"Liu Lin": "How did you fare? Did you learn a skill? You didn't... pick the wrong skill, did you?"
"Well, I say \"learn\", but more accurately, the knowledge is simply transcribed into your memory."
"You will still need to practice in order to be able to use your skills effectively. Be sure to use them so they become second nature."
"Be sure to use them until they become second nature."

"それから、あなたのアイテムパックに物資を送っておきました。
装備品とか、クラススキルに関連するパスとか。"
"Furthermore, I have transferred some items into your Inventory."
"Some classes and weapons match well with certain people, and match poorly with others. Please choose according to your own style."
"Last is... Ah, instructors for each Class can be found at the southern side of the City."
"They can teach you a lot more than I can, so please consult with them."
"Phew... Normally, I don't talk this much. I'm rather tired."
"That will be all from me, then. I look forward to working with you again."
"Obtained Prim Sword, Prim Knuckles, Prim Rifle, Prim Machineguns, Prim Rod, Prim Wand, Prim Katana, Prim Boots and a N-All Skill Tree Reset."
"Obtained Prim Sword, Prim Knuckles, Prim Rifle, Prim Machineguns, Prim Rod, Prim Wand, Prim Katana and Prim Boots."
"レネッサシリーズの＋29武器を一式、レネッサアーマ＋29を3個、N-全スキルツリー初期化を入手しました。"
"レネッサシリーズの＋29武器を一式、レネッサアーマ＋29を3個入手しました。"
